timeline.body:
Although, it is not very probable but possible test instability if the worker hangs for more than 10 sec.
In general, it would be nice to add a manual `Clock` to `ManuallyTriggeredScheduledExecutor` and inject it into `MetricRegistryImpl` constructor but this is an extra effort of course. Maybe a mocking executor would be easier.
